Description: Papyrus fragment bearing two lines of a Greek text written against the fibres. Joined with EA 10129; mounted with 10140, 10141, 10455, 10456, 10458, 10461, 10462.
Curator's comments: Register says 'Found in some tombs in the hills behind Assiut'. Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380629) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380629)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich Glass Binding Self adhesive tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A
